com.github.triceo.robozonky

Class PortfolioOverview

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.triceo.robozonky.PortfolioOverview

  • public class PortfolioOverview
extends Object
    Class with some aggregate statistics about user's portfolio. Used primarily as the main input into InvestmentStrategy.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static PortfolioOverview calculate(BigDecimal balance, Statistics stats, Collection<Investment> investments)
      Prepare an immutable portfolio overview, based on the provided information.
      int getCzkAvailable()
      Available balance in the wallet.
      int getCzkInvested()
      Sum total of all amounts yet unpaid.
      int getCzkInvested(Rating r)
      Amount yet unpaid in a given rating.
      BigDecimal getShareOnInvestment(Rating r)
      Retrieve the amounts due in a given rating, divided by getCzkInvested().
      Map<Rating,BigDecimal> getSharesOnInvestment()
      Retrieve getShareOnInvestment(Rating) for all ratings.

    • Method Detail

      • calculate

        public static PortfolioOverview calculate(BigDecimal balance,
                                          Statistics stats,
                                          Collection<Investment> investments)
        Prepare an immutable portfolio overview, based on the provided information.
        Parameters:
        balance - Current available balance in the wallet.
        stats - Statistics retrived from the Zonky API.
        investments - Investments not yet reflected in the Zonky API.
        Returns:
        Never null.

      • getCzkAvailable

        public int getCzkAvailable()
        Available balance in the wallet.
        Returns:
        Amount in CZK.

      • getCzkInvested

        public int getCzkInvested()
        Sum total of all amounts yet unpaid.
        Returns:
        Amount in CZK.

      • getCzkInvested

        public int getCzkInvested(Rating r)
        Amount yet unpaid in a given rating.
        Parameters:
        r - Rating in question.
        Returns:
        Amount in CZK.

      • getShareOnInvestment

        public BigDecimal getShareOnInvestment(Rating r)
        Retrieve the amounts due in a given rating, divided by getCzkInvested().
        Parameters:
        r - Rating in question.
        Returns:
        Share of the given rating on overall investments.

      • getSharesOnInvestment

        public Map<Rating,BigDecimal> getSharesOnInvestment()
        Retrieve getShareOnInvestment(Rating) for all ratings.
        Returns:
        All ratings will be present.
